channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large flood in road, 13th January
item.description:
There is a blocked drain in the road resulting in impassable pavements and road. It has been like this for a week and is much worse when it rains. Please can this be rectified
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 115, Anerley Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bright street light, 13th January
item.description:
They put so many very bright street lights. 4 lights on one corner. Not sure the reason why but clearly they don’t care that the lights are so close to the bedrooms that is impossible to have good sleep as all those lights make rooms very bright

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sidney Road, Stockwell, Greater London

item.title: Air fryer and foot stool, 13th January
item.description:
The people that live at 81 Turpington Lane have dumped a foot stool and a air fryer outside my gate the foot stool has been there about month and now they have added air fryer

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Turpington Lane, Bromley Common, Greater London

item.title: Large pothole pprox 2ft square on Chislehurst Rd just past Sherborne Rd on the left going towards Orpington, 13th January
item.description:
Large and deep pothole filled with rainwater is difficult to see especially at night. Punctured my front left tyre. It is dangerous! I called the Bromley out of hours service but they can only take a message.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 242, Chislehurst Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 20 gayton rd, nw31tx, 13th January
item.description:
The pavement borders are crumblings and stone is on the street with bits progessively loosening. i tried to attach a picture, the upload failed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gayton Road, Belsize Park, Greater London

item.title: Bottom of Murray Mews near Murray St vorner, 13th January
item.description:
As you can see on the photos, the metal gate is left open (it doesn’t shut) and blocking pavement, sometimes opens out to the road. Murray Mews’s neighbours have put rope to close it but the residents who live in the building always leave open. Please tell the owner of the building (there are a few flats in the building) to fix the gate so it would close properly and residents to close it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Murray Mews, Kentish Town, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More fly tipping, 13th January
item.description:
More bin bags and rubbish left on the street. Previous tipping on this site was cleared this morning

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queensbridge Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The caretaker piles rubbish in the shrubbery which could be folded and put in the main bins, 13th January
item.description:
He doesn’t clean the back or side of the flats, just piles rubbish at the front. There is a wooden palet at the back which has been there for around two months. The cardboard he’s piled in the plants could have been folded into the bin, he does this all the time and other people then add to the pile, it’s causing a flytipping issue

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37 - 59, Barham Road, Chislehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Constant illegal parking, 13th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Myron Place, Hither Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dogs taken into pitch, 13th January
item.description:
I've reported to Abbey oyeleye Housing officer for glebe estate about the dogs getting taken into the football pitch by Maria who is a neighbour on the estate. The dogs make a mess and shouldn't be taken in there as there are signs saying no dogs allowed. I sent numerous emails to Abbey but nothing has been done.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vestry Mews, Camberwell, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
